name: Football League 2025
summary: Viva World Football! Football League 2025 is here to shake up the pitch and bring your game to life like never before! Experience vibrant stadiums, lifelike player animations, smarter NPC AI, and breathtaking matchday atmospheres. Enjoy full 3D player action, improved interface UI, immersive multi-language commentary, and upgraded database. Customize your squad and build your dream team from over 40,000 players, then lead them to victory on the global stage!
